Name: Saccharine Pale
About the game: Saccharine Pale is heavily focused on core combat mechanics. - Includes a short interactive tutorial to get the player started. - Presents the player with deep, varied combat options and variables that leave plenty of room for player choice and creative expression. - Provides satisfying feedback and mechanical clarity that allows for the player to 'feel' the intensity of hits and parries. Slash, parry, and slam the enemy Stiltfox with Saccharine Pale's unique 'Directional Combat' system! - Juggle the enemy for as long as you can to rack up damage and gold! - Terrain affects knockback and friction! Launching the enemy into a stone surface deals more damage than launching it into grass or wood. - Explore the mechanics! There's TONS of tech to learn, and even more to develop yourself! Emergent gameplay galore!!! ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Join the Discord to show us what you're cooking! Suggest changes and features for future versions! Report bugs for expedited hotfixes! Talk with me (Poast) about the game!
